categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The batarikan was a type of snake found on Galidraan in the Outer Rim Territories. During the High Republic Era, the mercenary and former Jedi Ty Yorrick took a job to hunt a batarikan. Yorrick found that the snake had been infested by a Drengir, with roots crammed into its eyes and nasal cavities and its body leeched of nutrients, and that many of the locals had come to the same fate.
